Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: These results indicate that behavioral toxicity testing of alkylxanthines in a single mouse strain may be misleading and suggest that toxic responses of the central nervous system to this class of compounds are genetically influenced in mammals .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| toxic responses of the central nervous system |

The disease entity in this paragraph is "toxic responses of the central nervous system". This term refers to a state where the central nervous system is negatively affected by some harmful substance, in this case, the class of compounds called alkylxanthines.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |

| toxic responses of the central nervous system |

The only disease entity in this paragraph is "toxic responses of the central nervous system". The term "behavioral toxicity testing" refers to a method of testing, not a disease. Similarly, "alkylxanthines" refers to a class of compounds, not a disease.

Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: These results indicate that behavioral toxicity testing of alkylxanthines in a single mouse strain may be misleading and suggest that toxic responses of the central nervous system to this class of compounds are genetically influenced in mammals .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| alkylxanthines |

In the given paragraph, the term "alkylxanthines" is a chemical entity. Alkylxanthines are a class of compounds that contain an alkyl group and a xanthine moiety. They are often used in pharmaceuticals and include caffeine and theophylline as notable examples.
